title: Bug 116744 Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text element's Content Type property does not affect the display of the report.
EB:
The report displays the same results regardless of whether I set the dynamic text element's Content Type property to Auto, Plain, or HTML. The expected results are as follows:
- For Plain, the literal content (tags and all) should be displayed.
- For Auto, content 1, 2, and 3 should appear properly without HTML or RTF tags.
- For HTML, content 1 and 2 should appear properly without HTML tags, and content 3 should appear with RTF tags.
Please refer to the attached report for more details.
